question: You are starting a new business and need to build a website. You have a friend who works for an IT company who you want to help you. Write a letter to this friend. In your letterdescribe your new business ask your friend to help you build the websitesay how you will thank your friend for his/her help
text: How have you been? I hope you're doing great. Actually, I wanted your help in building a website for my new business. And want you to set your next 2 weekends free for me.

As you are aware, I was saving to start-up my own business. Finally, I'm on to it. The start-up is an online store for pet's food and toys. Not only I have built good contacts with the distributors and dealers, but also have set up a warehouse for storage. Moreover, got good deals with the courier service provider.

Yes, you had it coming. I want you to help me build the website for my venture. I have hired a designer to do all the coding, but need your expert guidance on the features and appearance of the online site. You have to set apart some time from your schedule so that I can  accordingly book the developer.
Furthermore, I have a small payback for your services, a gift hamper for your cute little bunnies. It has pellets and some yummy treats.
I hope to hear from you soon.
